## PublishingQueueExplorerTableExtensionsBuilder.toolbar property

Provides a mechanism for customizing the configuration of actions within Publishing Queue Explorer Table toolbar.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly toolbar: ActionsConfigurationExtensionsBuilder;
```
